document.full_text: one question raised at a commission briefing was whether the four-hour battery capacity at most american plants is adequate to run instruments, lights and valves until power can be restored after a blackout.
document.title: the latest from the n.r.c. on fukushima, and more
lines_and_colors: one question raised at a commission briefing was whether the four-hour battery capacity at most american plants is adequate to run instruments, lights and valves until power can be restored after a blackout.
